KIT.give.error.inv.full.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Dein [blue]Inventar</color> ist zu <color:#ff0000>voll</color> um das Starterkit zu erhalten! Leere dein [blue]Inventar</color> und versuche es erneut!</color>
KIT.give.error.inv.full.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>Your [blue]inventory</color> is too <color:#ff0000>full</color> to receive the starter kit! Empty your [blue]inventory</color> and try again!</color>

KIT.death.use.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Du kannst das [blue]Starterkit</color> nun wieder bekommen, da du <color:#ff0000>gestorben</color> bist!</color>
KIT.death.use.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>You can get use the [blue]starter kit</color> again, as you have <color:#ff0000>died</color>!</color>

KIT.death.use.error.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Du kannst das [blue]Starterkit</color> nur bekommen, wenn du <color:#ff0000>gestorben</color> bist!</color>
KIT.death.use.error.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>You can only get the [blue]starter kit</color> if you have <color:#ff0000>died</color>!</color>

KIT.error.cooldown.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Du musst noch [blue][time]</color> warten, bevor du das [blue]Starterkit</color> erneut erhalten kannst!</color>
KIT.error.cooldown.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>You have to wait [blue][time]</color> before you can receive the [blue]starter kit</color> again!</color>
